instruction: [INST] Analyze this file to learn MacBook motherboard repair. The 'definitions' section explains key technical terms. The 'threads' section contains real-world repair discussions. Use both sections to understand and learn how to troubleshoot MacBook issues. Posts from username 'larossmann' , 'dukefawks' , and '2informaticos' are posts from trusted experts.[/INST]

definitions.820-00165A: What is 820-00165A? a LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER.

threads.title: <LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER>820-00165A</LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER> no camera after bios replacement
threads.message: I have tried with another machine, its not the cable or camera problem, i have read there is a way, is to force update the firmware? But my machine already detect mojave and catalina ( no apfs problem), if i just reinstall macos, will the firmware be re updated again?

threads.title: <LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER>820-00165A</LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER> no camera after bios replacement
threads.message:
What was the reason of "bios replacement"?
No way to fix the problem cleaning ME region from original BIOS?

threads.title: <LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER>820-00165A</LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER> no camera after bios replacement
threads.message: board was missing bios chip.. can i have facetime function without original bios ?

threads.title: <LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER>820-00165A</LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER> no camera after bios replacement
threads.message: Post your serial number, so we can try to build a new BIOS, according with year of your machine.
